list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a consideration or amount that diminishes or balances the effect of a contrary one.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một phần bù chống lại lợi nhuận chịu thuế

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the amount or distance by which something is out of line.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: these wheels have an offset of four inches
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những bánh xe này có độ lệch bốn inch

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a side shoot from a plant serving for propagation.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a present of tulip bulbs, offsets, and seeds for his garden
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một món quà của bóng đèn tulip, bù đắp và hạt giống cho khu vườn của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sloping ledge in a wall or other feature where the thickness of the part above is diminished.
a bend in a pipe to carry it past an obstacle.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: allow for any bend you need including offsets for connecting the downpipe
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cho phép bất kỳ uốn cong nào bạn cần bao gồm cả offset để kết nối Downpipe

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a method of printing in which ink is transferred from a plate or stone to a uniform rubber surface and from that to the paper.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: họ đã sản xuất tiền giấy bằng cách bù đắp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: counteract (something) by having an opposing force or effect.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the deficit has been more than offset by capital inflows
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: thâm hụt đã được bù đắp nhiều hơn bởi dòng vốn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of ink or a freshly printed page) transfer an impression to the next leaf or sheet.
